hero.title: SkadiX - Cold-Chain Logistics Infrastructure
hero.subtitle: A data-driven decision-support tool to identify the suitability levels of European coastal cities and ports for cold-chain logistics infrastructure. Supporting food security, fisheries, and temperature-sensitive supply chains.

callToAction.title: Ready to Analyze Sea Level Import in Ports?
callToAction.description: Start using our interactive tool today to visualize sea level rise predictions and make informed decisions for port infrastructure planning.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Explore real-world applications of our cold-chain logistics infrastructure assessment tool across European coastal regions.
caseStudies.author: Author
caseStudies.noStudies: No case studies available at the moment.

cta.title: Ready to Analyze Your Port?
cta.description: Start using our interactive tool today to visualize sea level rise predictions and make informed decisions for port infrastructure planning.

studies.title: Rotterdam Port Adaptation
studies.description: How Europe's largest port is preparing for sea level rise with innovative infrastructure solutions. This comprehensive study examines the multi-billion euro investment in flood defenses, floating terminals, and adaptive logistics systems.
studies.author: Dr. Emma Johnson

studies.title: Shanghai Port Vulnerability Assessment
studies.description: Analysis of flood risks and economic impact of sea level rise on China's busiest container port. This study provides detailed risk assessments and recommendations for climate resilience strategies.
studies.author: Prof. Liu Wei

studies.title: Singapore's Resilience Strategy
studies.description: How Singapore is implementing cutting-edge sea defense systems to protect its vital maritime infrastructure. A detailed look at the city-state's comprehensive approach to coastal protection.
studies.author: Dr. Tan Mei Ling

studies.title: Hamburg Port Climate Adaptation
studies.description: Germany's second-largest port implements comprehensive climate adaptation measures including storm surge barriers and elevated infrastructure to protect against rising sea levels.
studies.author: Dr. Klaus Mueller

studies.title: Antwerp-Bruges Port Sustainability
studies.description: Belgium's largest port complex showcases innovative approaches to sustainable port operations while maintaining competitiveness in the face of climate challenges.
studies.author: Prof. Marie Dubois

studies.title: Marseille Port Modernization
studies.description: France's largest commercial port undergoes major infrastructure upgrades to enhance resilience against climate change while expanding capacity for Mediterranean trade.
studies.author: Dr. Pierre Laurent

studies.title: Singapore Port Climate Resilience
studies.description: Assessment of Singapore's port infrastructure adaptation strategies for climate change and sea level rise impacts.
studies.author: Prof. Li Wei Chen

studies.title: Hamburg Port Future Planning
studies.description: Strategic planning for Hamburg port's long-term sustainability and adaptation to changing sea levels and extreme weather events.
studies.author: Dr. Klaus Mueller

portSuitability.title: Port Suitability Analysis
portSuitability.dummyDataNote: Dummy Data: This is simulated data for demonstration. Real analysis will integrate ML models with Blue-Cloud and EDITO Digital Twin Ocean resources.

callToAction.title: Ready to Analyze Sea Level Impact on Ports?
callToAction.description: Start using our interactive tool today to visualize sea level rise predictions and make informed decisions for port infrastructure planning.

selectPort.title: Select a Port
selectPort.description: Choose from major international ports to analyze sea level rise impact. Our database includes detailed information on port infrastructure, elevation, and historical tide data.

chooseScenario.title: Choose Scenario and Year
chooseScenario.description: Select from different climate scenarios (low, medium, or high emissions) and projection years to see how sea levels might change over time under various conditions.

adjustParameters.title: Adjust Parameters
adjustParameters.description: Fine-tune your analysis by adjusting the weight of different factors such as elevation, tide patterns, infrastructure resilience, and historical flood risk.

visualizeResults.title: Visualize Results
visualizeResults.description: View the results on an interactive map showing predicted flood zones, risk levels, and port usability status. Generate detailed reports for planning and decision-making.

dataIntegration.title: Data Integration
dataIntegration.description: Comprehensive data from multiple sources including satellite measurements, tide gauges, and climate models to provide accurate sea level predictions.

prediction.title: Prediction
prediction.description: Advanced modeling techniques to predict sea level rise under different climate scenarios, helping ports prepare for future challenges.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Visual analysis tools that transform complex data into actionable insights, enabling informed decision-making for port authorities.

rotterdam.title: Rotterdam Port Adaptation
rotterdam.description: How Europe's largest port is preparing for sea level rise with innovative infrastructure solutions.

shanghai.title: Shanghai Port Vulnerability
shanghai.description: Analysis of flood risks and economic impact of sea level rise on China's busiest container port.

singapore.title: Singapore's Resilience Strategy
singapore.description: How Singapore is implementing cutting-edge sea defense systems to protect its vital maritime infrastructure.
